subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Adriana's Files/0718stacyeasterdesk.mp3 
  Uploaded by : adrianamjones <adrianamjones@...> 
  Description : Me: Ok youguys whoever it is thats talking to me  -- Voice says: Stacy (sec 3)  --- Me continued:  could you just tell me on thing (a voice says: "one year from easter" under my voice here, at second 5)..... Then voice says: I'm right on my desk (sec 9)  Then I finish: Where are you?   (Rich's box # 12 sweep mode)  Is this valid communication?  Thoughts, opininons? 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Adriana%27s%20Files/0718stacyeasterdesk.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.html
Regards,

adrianamjones <adrianamjones@...>
